Context:
The text provides information about changes to the LLC Laptop Loan Policy at George Brown College, which occurred on December 18, 2023. Students can access various resources and services offered by the library, including databases, tutorials, equipment loans (laptops, wifi hotspots, iPads), and assistance from librarians. The student ID functions as both a college identification card and a library card. Contact information for the library is available via phone (416-415-5000 x8255) or email (ask.george@georgebrown.ca). The library offers events, materials from past orientations, and updates about college news, application deadlines, and upcoming events. The text includes the contacts for the George Brown College general number (416-415-2000) and TTY number (1-877-515-5559).

EXTRACTED INFORMATION:
- December 18, 2023 (changes to LLC Laptop Loan Policy)
- Library resources and services: databases, tutorials, equipment loans, assistance from librarians
- Student ID as a library card
- Contact information for the library: phone (416-415-5000 x8255), email (ask.george@georgebrown.ca)
- Library events, materials from past orientations, and college news updates
- George Brown College general contact number (416-415-2000) and TTY number (1-877-515-5559).
